div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 181px; margin-left: 124px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 219px; margin-left: 4px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 156px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

ul.li: 从 LiteratureNotes 中产生的想法。
具有可行性的想法会被转换为 ProjectNotes。
调查、整理后，有价值的想法可转换为 PermanentNotes。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 199px; margin-left: 444px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 176px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

ul.li: 由ProjectNotes产生的结论、解决方案、总结等。

path.style: animation: 500ms linear 0s infinite normal none running ge-flow-animation-Hu-I3xCZipuPE1f9JVb0; stroke-dashoffset: 16;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 412px; margin-left: 565px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 136px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

ul.li: 基于文献、书籍产生的笔记。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 459px; margin-left: 4px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 136px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 9px; margin-left: 4px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 146px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

ul.li: 具有可行性的FleetingNotes，被转换为ProjectNotes，用于记录项目实践过程。
在项目过程中遇到的问题，解决方案，启发，结论，被链接到PermanentNotes。
